name: penguin.exe
description:
So, you've found your brother's old computer and decided that it's your mission to boot it. After several all-nighters the power of Red Bull and screwdriver helped you to finally boot this... What's this thing? Some sort of mouse-only interface? Of course you have one of these ancient manipulators around, you weirdo! Hmm, the only program here is "penguins.exe".  I'd rather not touch it, but who am I to stop you?

Use mouse to start programs (only one works), select files and throw files and penguins into recycling bin (doesn't work with folders though). Don't run out of CPU or RAM.

Contains music ©2021 Joshua McLean (https://joshua-mclean.itch.io) Licensed under Creative Commons Attribution 4.0 International
